Summary: Bright light in the Northern sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Barnesville
There were no other sightings in Barnesville on or around October 22nd 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a large(penny sized to the eye) glowing ball which seemed to move towardsme. I tried to talk but just wasnt able to speak. I felt a wierd sort oftinkling in my hands and feet. As the object moved closer it seemed to get realdim and then it stop for at least a second or two then head to the eastincreasing speed. Then all of a suddend the object seemed to disappear. Ibelive highly in paranormal activity and highly belive that this was a UFO.
